answers.answer: aw hun congrats on ur girl and im sorry u havent been able to hold her yet, i will pray for u both and i hope that u enjoy your first hold of ur baby girl!x
I hope that everything goes well. Best wishes and congratulations :-)
Congratulations!!! I'll be praying that everything goes well for you and your little girl and that you both get to go home soon, happy and healthy. Take care. :-)

question: Alexis Cyanne came into the world today at 12:04pm. She was delivered by a planned c-section at 37wks 3days (original due date was July 4th) due to gestational diabetes and mild pre-eclampsia. She weighed a whopping 10lbs and was 20 1/2 inches long. She is in the NICU due to low blood sugar and not wanting to eat a lot yet. Please pray for my little girl. I haven't even got to hold her yet or visit her in the NICU since I still have a morphine pump and a catheter in. But it all comes out tomorrow. I can't wait to hold my new little girl. :) I got my tubes tied today so this is our last baby.
title: Alexis is here!
